page.title: 19SCHOOLS 2
page.content: Gawsworth School continued. go and wash their hands. After they go into the hall and start dinner. At 1200pm another bell rngs and that means that the people who have packed lunches can go out to play. Around 1230pm the bell for sandwitches rings. that means that they can go into the hall and have their lunch, and the people who have school dinners can go out and play. At 1250pm a bell rings and all the children have to go inside again and do some more work. We go out to play again at 210pm and we play out until 230pm . The bell rings again and we go in until hometime. The infants work until 315pm and then they go home, and the junior children go home at 32.opm, and that os the end of the school day. Kate Wilbraham.
